channel.title: Shenzhen-Stock-Exchange on Uncle Xiang's Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in Shenzhen-Stock-Exchange on Uncle Xiang's Notebook

item.title: Exchange API Documentation Summary
item.description:
In my fifth year of financial software development, I’ve been dealing with various exchange interface documents – particularly familiar with the Hong Kong Stock Exchange’s documentation. Recently, while handling ChinaConnect business, I reviewed materials from the Shenzhen and Shanghai stock exchanges.

hkex

Please provide the Chinese text you want me to translate. I am ready when you are! Just paste the text here.
